$:/plugins/kookma/commander/buttons/page.title: $:/plugins/kookma/commander/buttons/pagecontrol
$:/plugins/kookma/commander/buttons/page.caption: {{$:/plugins/kookma/commander/images/commander.svg}} {{$:/language/Buttons/Commander/Caption}}
$:/plugins/kookma/commander/buttons/page.text: \whitespace trim \define commander-button(class) \whitespace trim <$button to="$:/Commander" tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/Commander/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/Commander/Caption}} class="""$(tv-config-toolbar-class)$ $class$"""> <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> {{$:/plugins/kookma/commander/images/commander.svg}} <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> <$text text={{$:/language/Buttons/Commander/Caption}}/> \end <$list filter="[list[$:/StoryList]] +[field:title[$:/Commander]]" emptyMessage=<>> <>

$:/plugins/danielo515/encryptTiddler/cry.title: $:/plugins/danielo515/encryptTiddler/crypt-button
$:/plugins/danielo515/encryptTiddler/cry.caption: {{$:/plugins/danielo515/encryptTiddler/unlocked}} encrypt tiddler
$:/plugins/danielo515/encryptTiddler/cry.creator: Danielo
$:/plugins/danielo515/encryptTiddler/cry.text:
\whitespace trim <$transclude tiddler="$:/plugins/danielo515/encryptTiddler/openPopup"/> <$encryptTiddler passwordTiddler1="$:/temp/password1" passwordTiddler2="$:/temp/password2"> <$reveal state="$:/state/encrypt" type="match" text={{!!title}} animate="yes">
<$edit-text tiddler="$:/temp/password1" tag="input" type="password" default="" placeholder="password" class="tc-edit-texteditor"/>
<$list filter="[all[current]!has[encrypted]]">
<$edit-text tiddler="$:/temp/password2" tag="input" type="password" default="" placeholder="repeat" class="tc-edit-texteditor"/>
<$list filter="[all[current]!has[encrypted]]"> <$button message="tw-encrypt-tiddler" set="$:/state/encrypt" setTo="" >Encrypt <$list filter="[is[current]has[encrypted]]"> <$button message="tw-decrypt-tiddler" set="$:/state/encrypt" setTo="" >Decrypt

$:/plugins/danielo515/encryptTiddler/ope.title: $:/plugins/danielo515/encryptTiddler/openPopup
$:/plugins/danielo515/encryptTiddler/ope.text: <$reveal state="$:/state/encrypt" type="nomatch" text={{!!title}} animate="no"><$button set="$:/state/encrypt" setTo={{!!title}} class="tc-btn-invisible">{{$:/plugins/danielo515/encryptTiddler/unlocked}} <$list filter="[prefix[yes]]"> <$text text="encrypt tiddler"/> <$reveal state="$:/state/encrypt" type="match" text={{!!title}} animate="no"><$button set="$:/state/encrypt" setTo="" class="tc-btn-invisible">{{$:/plugins/danielo515/encryptTiddler/unlocked}} <$list filter="[prefix[yes]]"> <$text text="encrypt tiddler"/>

$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/ui/ControlPa.title: $:/plugins/kookma/favorites/ui/ControlPanel/Settings
$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/ui/ControlPa.caption: Favorites
$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/ui/ControlPa.text:
\define checked-frozen()
<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/ui/sidebar/active-tab" tags=""/>
<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/ui/buttons/add-remove" tags=""/> 
<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/tab/sidebar--595412856" text="$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/ui/sidebar/frozen-tab"/> 
\end

\define unchecked-frozen()
<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/ui/sidebar/active-tab" tags="$:/tags/SideBar"/>
<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/ui/buttons/add-remove" tags="$:/tags/ViewToolbar"/> 
<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/tab/sidebar--595412856" text="$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/ui/sidebar/active-tab"/> 
\end

These settings let you customize the behaviour of the Favorites plugin.

---

;Show Favorites setting in more sidebar
:<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/ui/ControlPanel/Settings" tag="$:/tags/MoreSideBar"> Show setting in more sidebar</$checkbox>

;Options
:<$checkbox tiddler="$:/config/favorites/FolderOpenOnDrop" field="text"
    checked="yes" unchecked="no" default="no"> Open folder on drop item</$checkbox>
:<input type="checkbox" disabled> Viewtoolbar icon color <$edit-text tiddler="$:/config/favorites/IconColor" 
	field="text" tag="input" type="color" class="kk-fv-color-input"/> <$list filter="[[$:/config/favorites/IconColor]get[text]!match[#ff0000]]" variable=null>
	<$button class="tc-btn-invisible kk-fav-btn" tooltip="Reset viewtoolbar icon color">{{$:/core/images/refresh-button}}
    <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/config/favorites/IconColor" text="#ff0000" />
  </$button>
	</$list>
	 
;Freeze favorites
:<$checkbox checkactions=<<checked-frozen>> 
   tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/ui/sidebar/frozen-tab" tag="$:/tags/SideBar"
	 checkactions=<<checked-frozen>>
	 uncheckactions=<<unchecked-frozen>> > Enable frozen tab</$checkbox>

;Shortcuts
: <label class="kk-fav-label">Expand folder</label><$edit-text tiddler="$:/config/favorites/modifierkey/expand-folder" tag=input default="" placeholder="a moifier key like ctrl" class="kk-fav-input"/> + <kbd>click</kbd>
: <label class="kk-fav-label">Open folder in story river</label><$edit-text tiddler="$:/config/favorites/modifierkey/open-folder" tag=input default="" placeholder="a moifier key like shift" class="kk-fav-input"/> + <kbd>click</kbd>

$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/ui/buttons/a.title: $:/plugins/kookma/favorites/ui/buttons/add-remove
$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/ui/buttons/a.caption: {{$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/images/heart}}{{$:/language/Buttons/Favorites/Caption/Add}}
$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/ui/buttons/a.text: \whitespace trim \import [[$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/macros/definition]] \define add-this-tiddler() [[$(currentTiddler)$]]+[putfirst[]] \define remove-this-tiddler() -[[$(currentTiddler)$]] \define show-favorites-button(class) \whitespace trim <$list filter='[match[yes]]'> {{$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/images/heart}} <$list filter='[match[yes]]'> <$text text={{$:/language/Buttons/Favorites/Caption/Add}}/> \end \define add-to-favorites-button() <$button tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/Favorites/Hint/Add}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/Favorites/Caption/Add}} class=<>> <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $field='list' $subfilter=<>/> <$macrocall $name="show-favorites-button" class="notselected"/> \end \define remove-from-favorites-button() <$button tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/Favorites/Hint/Remove}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/Favorites/Caption/Remove}} class=<> > <$action-listops $tiddler={{{[subfiltercontainslimit[1]]}}} $field='list' $subfilter=<>/> <$macrocall $name="show-favorites-button" class="selected"/> \end <$list filter="[all[current]listed[]taglimit[1]]" variable=null emptyMessage=<> > <>

$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/ui/sidebar/a.title: $:/plugins/kookma/favorites/ui/sidebar/active-tab
$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/ui/sidebar/a.caption: Favorites
$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/ui/sidebar/a.text:
\import $:/plugins/kookma/favorites/macros/definition \import [all[tiddlers+shadows]tag[$:/tags/Favorites/Macro/Folder]] \define show-options() <$button class="tc-btn-invisible kk-fav-btn" to="$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/ui/manager"> {{$:/core/images/options-button}} Manager \end \define colapse-all() <$list filter="[prefix[$(temppath)$/slider/]!suffix] :filter[{!!text}match[open]] :and[limit[1]]" variable="null"> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible kk-fav-btn" tooltip="collapse all folders, open Recently added" actions='<$action-deletetiddler $filter="[prefix[$(temppath)$/slider/]]"/>' > {{$:/core/images/fold-button}} \end
---  <> <>

<$transclude tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/templates/ui-folder-tree" field=text/>

$:/plugins/kookma/kara/ui/ControlPanel/S.title: $:/plugins/kookma/kara/ui/ControlPanel/Settings
$:/plugins/kookma/kara/ui/ControlPanel/S.caption: Kara
$:/plugins/kookma/kara/ui/ControlPanel/S.text:
\import $:/plugins/kookma/kara/macros/definitions
These settings let you customise the behaviour of Kara plugin.

---

;Show Kara setting in more sidebar
:<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/kara/ui/ControlPanel/Settings" tag="$:/tags/MoreSideBar"> Show setting in "More" sidebar</$checkbox>

;Options
:<$checkbox tiddler=<<interstitialDisplayConfig>> field="text" checked="reverse"> Interstitial notes in reverse chronological order</$checkbox>
:<$checkbox tiddler=<<checklistDisplayConfig>>    field="text" checked="sort"> Sort checklist items, display completed at the bottom</$checkbox>

$:/plugins/tobibeer/preview/defaults/not.title: $:/plugins/tobibeer/preview/defaults/not
$:/plugins/tobibeer/preview/defaults/not.text: tc-drop-down tc-sidebar-scrollable tc-topbar tc-tiddler-title tc-menubar tc-quickbar leftopentab-content

$:/xp/mcp/readme.title: $:/xp/mcp/readme
$:/xp/mcp/readme.text:
These plugins are included:

* [[CodeMirror|$:/plugins/tiddlywiki/codemirror]]
* [[Command palette|$:/plugins/souk21/commandpalette]]
* [[EditButtons|$:/plugins/telmiger/EditButtons]]
* [[encryptTiddler|$:/plugins/danielo515/encryptTiddler]]
* [[Favorites|$:/plugins/kookma/favorites]]
* [[FontAwesome|$:/plugins/TheDiveO/FontAwesome]]
* [[Help|$:/plugins/tiddlywiki/help]]
* [[Kara|$:/plugins/kookma/kara]]
* [[Markdown|$:/plugins/tiddlywiki/markdown]]
* [[Pretty link button|$:/plugins/tg/prettylink-button]]
* [[Preview|$:/plugins/tobibeer/preview]]
* [[Shiraz|$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz]]
* [[Tiddler Commander|$:/plugins/kookma/commander]]
* [[TiddlyMap|$:/plugins/felixhayashi/tiddlymap]]
* [[Trashbin|$:/plugins/kookma/trashbin]]
* [[Utility|$:/plugins/kookma/utility]]

> Caution: Make sure the tiddlers are deactivated, when disabling or removing plugins.

$:/plugins/kookma/refnotes/ui/bibtexlibr.title: $:/plugins/kookma/refnotes/ui/bibtexlibrary
$:/plugins/kookma/refnotes/ui/bibtexlibr.caption: Bibliography
$:/plugins/kookma/refnotes/ui/bibtexlibr.text:
\import [[$:/plugins/kookma/refnotes/macros/search-ui]] \define dispEntry() <$link/> <$macrocall $name=stretchText text=""" <$view field="bibtex-author"/>. (<$view field="bibtex-year"/>). <$view field="bibtex-title"/>.""" /> \end \define searchFilter() [has[bibtex-title]search:$(sField)$[$(sTerm)$]] \define bibLibrary() \import [[$:/plugins/kookma/refnotes/macros/stretch-text]] <$vars sField={{{[get[field]] ~[[bibtex-author]]}}} sTerm={{{[get[text]]}}}>
Show and Hide Details:   <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="show item details">{{$:/core/images/down-arrow}} <$list filter="[subfilter]"> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text=show /> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="hide item details">{{$:/core/images/up-arrow}} <$list filter="[subfilter]"> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<> />
    <$list filter="[subfilter]">
  1. <>
\end
<> {{$:/plugins/kookma/refnotes/ui/dropzone}}
<> <>

$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/ui/ControlPanel.title: $:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/ui/ControlPanel/Settings
$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/ui/ControlPanel.caption: Shiraz
$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/ui/ControlPanel.text:
These settings let you customise the behaviour of Shiraz plugin.

---

;Show Shiraz setting in more sidebar
:<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/ui/ControlPanel/Settings" tag="$:/tags/MoreSideBar"> Show setting in more sidebar</$checkbox>

;Options
:<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/styles/multicols/storyriver" tag="$:/tags/Stylesheet"> Multicolumn story river</$checkbox>
:<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/styles/ui/colorify-buttons" tag="$:/tags/Stylesheet"> Colorful UI buttons</$checkbox>
:<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/styles/ui/view-toolbar-button-visibility" tag="$:/tags/Stylesheet"> Tiddler visibility on mouse hover</$checkbox>
:<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/styles/ui/edit-toolbar-buttons" tag="$:/tags/Stylesheet"> Traffic lights for edit toolbar buttons</$checkbox>
:<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/styles/colorful-sidebar-tab" tag="$:/tags/Stylesheet"> Colorify sidebar tabs</$checkbox>

;Set dark and light palettes
{{$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/ui/set-dark-light-palette}}

$:/plugins/felixhayashi/tiddlymap/misc/q.title: $:/plugins/felixhayashi/tiddlymap/misc/quickConnectButton
$:/plugins/felixhayashi/tiddlymap/misc/q.caption: {{$:/plugins/felixhayashi/tiddlymap/icon}} {{$:/language/Buttons/TiddlyMap/Caption}}
$:/plugins/felixhayashi/tiddlymap/misc/q.text:
\define buttonClass() $(tv-config-toolbar-class)$ $(additional-classes)$ \define nonExistentItem() <> (will be created) \end \define noConnectionsMsg() //No connections found!// \end \define normalSearchFilter() [!is[system]!has[draft.of]search:title{$:/temp/quickConnectSearch}sortcs[title]limit[50]] \end \define regexSearchFilter() [!is[system]!has[draft.of]regexp{$:/temp/quickConnectSearch}sortcs[title]limit[50]] \end \define showButton(state) \whitespace trim <$button set="$:/temp/tmap/state/popup/quickConnect" setTo="$state$" tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/TiddlyMap/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/TiddlyMap/Caption}} class=<>> <$list filter="[prefix[yes]]">{{$:/xp/images/tiddlymap}} <$list filter="[prefix[yes]]"> <$text text={{$:/language/Buttons/TiddlyMap/Caption}}/> \end \define searchResults() <$button tooltip="Create incoming edge"> <> <$action-sendmessage $message="tmap:tm-create-edge" from=<> to=<> force="true" label={{$:/temp/quickConnectSearch/type}} view={{$:/temp/quickConnectSearch/view}} /> <$button tooltip="Create outgoing edge"> <> <$action-sendmessage $message="tmap:tm-create-edge" from=<> to=<> force="true" label={{$:/temp/quickConnectSearch/type}} view={{$:/temp/quickConnectSearch/view}} /> <$list filter="[is[tiddler]]" emptyMessage=<>> <$view tiddler=<> field="title" /> \end \define hidePopup() <$macrocall $name="showButton" state=<> /> \end \define showPopup() <$set name="additional-classes" value="tmap-active-button"> <$macrocall $name="showButton" state="" /> <$set name="searchFilter" filter="[field:title[$:/state/tmap/tid-toolbar]has[re-filter]]" value=<> emptyValue=<>>
Create connection
Type: <$edit-text tiddler="$:/temp/quickConnectSearch/type" field="text" type="text" tag="input" default="" /> <$select tiddler="$:/temp/quickConnectSearch/type" default=""> <$list filter=<>>
Search: <$edit-text tiddler="$:/temp/quickConnectSearch" type="text" tag="input" default=""> <$checkbox tiddler="$:/state/tmap/tid-toolbar" field="re-filter" checked="1" unchecked="" default=""> regexp
<$list filter=<> variable="item"> <> <$list filter="[{$:/temp/quickConnectSearch}regexp[.+]] -[is[tiddler]]" variable="item"> <>
Existing Connections
<$select tiddler="$:/state/tmap/tid-toolbar" field="direction" default="both"> <$checkbox tiddler="$:/state/tmap/tid-toolbar" field="filter.links" checked="-[[tw-body:link]]" unchecked="" default=""> hide links
<$tmap-connections filter=<> direction={{$:/state/tmap/tid-toolbar!!direction}} emptyMessage=<>>
>><> <$link to=<>><$view field="title" /> <> <$button tooltip="Delete this connection" class="tc-btn-invisible">{{$:/core/images/close-button}} <$action-sendmessage $message="tmap:tm-remove-edge" id=<> from=<> to=<> type=<> />
\end <$list filter="[all[current]is[tiddler]]"><$list filter="[{$:/temp/tmap/state/popup/quickConnect}prefix]" variable="item" emptyMessage=<>><>

$:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/ui/sidebar.title: $:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/ui/sidebar
$:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/ui/sidebar.caption: Trashbin
$:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/ui/sidebar.text:
\import $:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/macros/sort \import $:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/macros/restore \import $:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/macros/confirm-empty \import $:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/macros/bulk-operation \import $:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/macros/preview-option \define show-link() \whitespace trim <$link to=<> ><$text text={{{ [removeprefix[$:/trashbin/]] }}} /> <$reveal state="$:/xp/trashbin/delete-date" type="match" text="show">  <$view field="modified" format="date" template="0MM/0DD/YYYY 0hh:0mm AM"/> \end \define date-button() <$list filter="[title[$:/xp/trashbin/delete-date]!is[tiddler]]"> <$button set="$:/xp/trashbin/delete-date" setTo="show" tooltip="Show date" class="tc-btn-invisible"> {{$:/xp/images/time}} <$list filter="[title[$:/xp/trashbin/delete-date]is[tiddler]]"> <$button tooltip="Hide date" class="tc-btn-invisible"> <$action-deletetiddler $filter="$:/xp/trashbin/delete-date"/> {{$:/xp/images/remove}} \end \define recycle-button() {{||$:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/ui/toolbar-button}} \end \define delete-button() <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="Delete permanently"> {{$:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/images/times.svg}} <$list filter="[list[$:/StoryList]] +[field:title>]" variable=ignore> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-close-tiddler" $param=<<> /> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<> /> \end \define trashbin-siderbar-ui() <$list filter='[tag[$:/tags/trashbin]prefix[$:/trashbin/]limit[1]]' variable=null emptyMessage="Trashbin is empty">
<> <> <> <> <>    <$count filter='[tag[$:/tags/trashbin]]'/> items <$list filter="[tag[$:/tags/trashbin]prefix[$:/trashbin/]$(sortType)$]">
<>
<>
<>
\end <$vars sortType={{{[get[text]] ~[[]] }}}> <>

$:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/ui/toolbar-bu.title: $:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/ui/toolbar-button
$:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/ui/toolbar-bu.caption: {{$:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/images/trash-alt}} {{$:/language/Buttons/Trashbin/Caption/Move}}
$:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/ui/toolbar-bu.text: \import $:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/macros/move-to-trashbin \import $:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/macros/restore \whitespace trim <$list filter="[all[current]!tag[$:/tags/trashbin]!prefix[$:/trashbin/]]"> <$button aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/Trashbin/Caption/Move}} tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/Trashbin/Hint/Move}} class=<> > <$macrocall $name="move-to-trashbin" tiddler=<> /> <$list filter="[prefix[yes]]"> {{$:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/images/trash-alt}} <$list filter="[prefix[yes]]"> <$text text={{$:/language/Buttons/Trashbin/Caption/Move}}/> <$list filter="[all[current]tag[$:/tags/trashbin]prefix[$:/trashbin/]]"> <$button aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/Trashbin/Caption/Recycle}} tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/Trashbin/Hint/Recycle}} class=<> > <$macrocall $name="restore" tiddler=<> /> <$list filter="[prefix[yes]]"> {{$:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/images/recycle}} <$list filter="[prefix[yes]]"> <$text text={{$:/language/Buttons/Trashbin/Caption/Recycle}}/>

$:/plugins/kookma/utility/styles/tw-vers.title: $:/plugins/kookma/utility/styles/tw-version
$:/plugins/kookma/utility/styles/tw-vers.text:
/* TW-version added to site title */
.tc-site-title:before {
  content:"TW <>";
  position:absolute;
  margin-top:-1.9em;
  color:silver;
  font-size:13px;
}

$:/plugins/kookma/utility/ui/Buttons/Vie.title: $:/plugins/kookma/utility/ui/Buttons/ViewFields
$:/plugins/kookma/utility/ui/Buttons/Vie.caption: {{$:/plugins/kookma/utility/images/view-fields.svg}} {{$:/language/Buttons/Utility/Caption}}
$:/plugins/kookma/utility/ui/Buttons/Vie.description: Show a toggle button for view fields
$:/plugins/kookma/utility/ui/Buttons/Vie.text: \whitespace trim \define stateTid() $:/state/utility/view-fields \define show-fields-button() \whitespace trim <$reveal type="nomatch" state=<> text="show" default="hide"> <$button set=<> setTo="show" tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/Utility/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/Utility/Caption}} class=<> > <> <$reveal type="match" state=<> text="show" default="hide"> <$button set=<> setTo="hide" tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/Utility/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/Utility/Caption}} class="""$(tv-config-toolbar-class)$ tc-selected"""> <> \end \define disp-on-pagecontrols() \whitespace trim <$list filter="[prefix[yes]]"> {{$:/plugins/kookma/utility/images/view-fields.svg}} <$list filter="[prefix[yes]]"> <$text text={{$:/language/Buttons/Utility/Caption}}/> \end <>

$:/plugins/kookma/utility/ui/ControlPane.title: $:/plugins/kookma/utility/ui/ControlPanel/Settings
$:/plugins/kookma/utility/ui/ControlPane.caption: Utility
$:/plugins/kookma/utility/ui/ControlPane.text:
These settings let you customise the behaviour of Utility plugin. --- ;Show Utility setting in more sidebar :<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/utility/ui/ControlPanel/Settings" tag="$:/tags/MoreSideBar"> Show setting in more sidebar ;Options :<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/utility/ui/Buttons/ViewFields" tag="$:/tags/PageControls"> Enable show fields :<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/utility/styles/tw-version" tag="$:/tags/Stylesheet"> Show the Tiddlywiki version badge :<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/utility/viewtemplate/display-tiddler-raw-content" tag="$:/tags/ViewTemplate"> Display the tiddler raw content
<$list filter="[[$:/plugins/kookma/utility/viewtemplate/display-tiddler-raw-content]tags[]search[$:/tags/ViewTemplate]]" variable=ignore> Filters to reveal tiddlers content   <$edit-text tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/utility/config/reveal-tags" field="text" tag=input defualt="" placeholder="enter a filter e.g. [tag[myTag]] " class="kk-ut-txt"/>

$:/plugins/kookma/utility/viewtemplates/.title: $:/plugins/kookma/utility/viewtemplates/reveal-code
$:/plugins/kookma/utility/viewtemplates/.text:
<$reveal type="nomatch" stateTitle=<<folded-state>> text="hide" tag="div" retain="yes" animate="yes">
<$transclude tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/utility/macros/reveal-code" />
</$reveal>
<!--This viewtemplate uses the code in $:/plugins/kookma/utility/macros/reveal-code tiddler. The reason is this tiddler will change tag and so on plugin update user may miss to delete it to be updated to latest version.-->
